title: Hextech Shards after season ends.
body:
Since hextech is a new consept, i would like to know what i will lose after the new season starts (or preseason). 
1. * I have a few champion shards, and a few skin shards, and wards, 
2. * No boxes and no keys
3. * I have got boxes with almost all champs but just one (1 box per champion). 
4. * Some orange and blue essence. 

What will i lose after the preseason, or new season starts? 
1. would i lose all shards and essence? 
2. would i keep the shards, and be able to get boxes with the same champions again (the champs i used to get boxes in current season)

replies.body: I don't know of any plans to remove regular hextech content each season. Can you link me to where you got this information? o.O
